about_the_game:
Emma Riley: Dream Detective is a detective game where you must unravel an occult conspiracy spanning both the real and dream worlds. Use keen observation to gather clues, carefully interrogate suspects for information, and use your logic and deduction skills to unravel the mystery!

Engaging Story

Join Emma as she returns to her hometown, haunted by the disappearance of her sister, Amelia. Unravel the secrets of Moonridge Hollow as you navigate a web of intrigue, betrayal, and dark family secrets. With each revelation, Emma's quest for the truth leads her deeper into the heart of darkness, culminating in a climactic showdown that will test her courage and resolve. Explore richly detailed environments, interact with intriguing characters, and piece together clues to uncover the truth behind Amelia's vanishing act. As the mysteries of Moonridge Hollow unfold, will you have what it takes to confront the shadows of the past and uncover the truth?

Gather Clues

Explore the town of Moonridge Hollow in search of clues. At each location you will need to use your sense of observation to spot anything out of the ordinary that could help in unraveling the mystery. But beware of red herrings that can throw you off the scent!

Interrogate Suspects

Moonridge Hollow is full of intriguing characters each with their own motives, agendas, and secrets. Are they telling the truth? Are they lying? Look for contradictions between their statements and the evidence you gathered to break their composure and get to the truth. Trust no one in your search for your missing sister!

Use Deduction to Solve the Mystery

Emma Riley: Dream Detective is more than just gathering clues and listening to testimony. You must take on the role of detective and use logic and deduction to piece all the information together. Can you figure out what really happened to Amelia?

Explore the Dream World

Dark occult secrets await Emma in Moonridge Hollow. But Emma has burgeoning supernatural powers of her own to help her on her quest. Step into the dreams of the suspects and discover the innermost thoughts and secrets. Step into the past of objects to discover their history. Use Emma’s supernatural insight to help you solve the mystery!

Race Against Time

Emma has reluctantly returned to her hometown of Moonridge Hollow to find her missing sister. However, she cannot stay there forever and sooner or later she must leave and return to her life in the city. Can she solve the mystery before she has to go?

Features

• Engaging Story
• Gather Clues
• Interrogate Suspects
• Use Deduction to Solve the Mystery
• Explore the Dream World
• Race Against Time

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mature themes including supernatural elements, mystery, and mild violence. It also involves discussions of family tensions, betrayal, and dark secrets that may be unsettling to some players. Player discretion is advised.
